name: slvcopy
description: Génère un fichier de sauvegarde à l'ouverture dans l'éditeur de texte

SLV-copy.deleteDelay.description: Number of months of backup, files with an earlier date will be deleted from the backup directory (all users combined) when using the clean command

SLV-copy.numberOfSauvPerso.description: Number of personal backups kept (from the most recent to the oldest) when using the clean function

SLV-copy.keyValueFolder.description: Backup array based on initial file path. Example: 'SLV-copy.keyValueFolder' : [['c:\Users\dossierInitial1\',C:/Users/dossierSauv1/'],['c:\Users\dossierInitial2\','C:/Users/dossierSauv2/']]

SLV-copy.authorizedFileType.description: Array of file extension definitions that will be saved. By default : ['html','css','scss','js'].

SLV-copy.excludeFolder.description: Folder exclusion array so that the backup does not occur. Example : 'SLV-copy.excludeFolder:['c:\Users\dossierInitial1\','c:\Users\dossierInitial2\']'

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
